comments.message:
The #GoldenVillage #CocaColaFreestyleSG Contest has come to an end! Thank you everyone for all the creative answers! Congratulations to:

• Mei Ying
• Lye Jia Wei
• Fifie Ianzy
• Sunny Goh
• Jeremy Loi

You’ve each won for yourselves a pair of #GoldenVillage movie tickets that come with two Coca-Cola Freestyle Drinks! Please directly message us with your full name, NRIC, email address and contact number so we can get in touch with prize collection details!
Thank you everyone for taking part and do keep a lookout for #CocaColaFreesyleSG!

Coca-Cola Lime is the perfect movie drink 'cause it's Coca-Cola to start with & having Lime in it means I'll be kept fresh awake throughout the movie! Since sometimes I've to compromise with my husband by watching a movie which is not of my interest, just to spend time with him! 😂

#CocaColaFreestyleSG #GoldenVillage

Nothing can Beat a Refreshing Ginger Ale + Fanta Orange for a movie !! CoCa Cola Company dun only have Coke !! Be Creative ~!! My friends always know me for mixing drinks including weird combinations too !! & of course Now I won't get weird stares when I order a half coke half sprite !! Hehess

Coca coke lemon is the perfect drink, it's to fresh my mouth to have fresh air and brighter my life when watching movies, it's make my appetite open n fresher up! Share with my loved one with coca coke lemon! 😍😍😍

Coca-Cola Vanilla makes a good topic to talk about and to drink during a movie. As we know, there are usually 10-15minutes of advertisement before the movie and by engaging in a conversation regarding this unique drink that we don't find normally seems like a good enough topic. So it's not just a drink :)

Coke Zero!! Especially ice cool ones...love the feeling of the Coke Zero gliding down my throat and then I get this gassy explosion within...shiokness to the max. And I don't even have to worry about sugar or calories, yet I get the good old taste of COKE!! Pair it with some pop corn...oooo laaa laaa...im in Coke Cola Heaven already

The Rainbow mix 1st with ginger ale, follow by fanta lime , peach, cherry, orange and lime and finished it with coca-cola, due to the diffenrent liquid density, the colour will stay in different layers and slowly mixed together for a fruit taste~
Fanta Grape + Coca Cola Zero! A healthier choice with a tinge of fruity taste, the perfect drink for a movie night especially after some salted Popcorn! =)

Being a great fan of Coca Cola since young, my expected bet would be the original Coca Cola! However, after been to the launch of the new Coca Cola freestyle campaign at Cineleisure the other day, my choice would definitely be the caffeine free Coke Zero cherry vanilla! Although one might have doubts about its taste at first, it actually does taste awesome! Not only is it caffeine free, it is zero sugar which is a much healthier choice! With a refreshing mix of cherry and vanilla, for sure, it would sweeten my movie experience👍 Hoping to win that pair of GV  tickets along with these beverages so as to spend some quality time with my love one amidst our busy lives! #CocaColaFreestyleSG #GoldenVillage
Coca -cola zero or coke light because it blends well with popcorn and it is healthy so as when I am sitting down to watch movie ,there is something to munch without any worry of putting on weight 😃😀
Coca-cola coke zero with vodka.. Best to chill with movie.. Let the vodka relaxe your mind while coke fizz up your body...

Coca-cola vanilla will be a perfect  beverage for me when watching movie. Keep me awake throughout. Just absolutely love vanilla 

#CocaColaFreestyleSG #GoldenVillage
Sprite vanilla Freestyle beverage is the perfect movie drink. Sprite are light in taste compared to Coca-cola and you can truly enjoy the sweet smelling taste of the vanilla <3

Sometimes watching a movie after a day at work is so tiring. I would like to have Original Cocacola with Lime! It will refresh myself. While enjoying my Ice Cocacola Freestyle beverage,it will keep my energy at tip top so I could chill, relax and enjoy my movie. Watching a movie and enjoying Cocacola Freestyle at the same time is just like A dream come true! <3

Coca-Cola of course.  It's the magical taste of Coca-Cola that adds to the enjoyment of the movie going experience.  It's really beyond what words can describe.  It's just a mouthful of nerve relaxing and festivity taste!
Coca-cola zero is the most perfect movie drink cos watching movie is already relieving stress and having my favorite beverage makes me even more happy. :D

Fanta Lime and Coca Cola Original! Just like a movie, this combination is filled with a twist.

The fizzy drink is suitable for exciting action packed movies. The lime sour zesty taste would complement horror movie well as it excite the senses! The sweet and refreshing orange taste is just like a romance film- sweet and shy

Can't wait to watch movie with Coke Freestyle in my hands!

 #CocaColaFreestyleSG
#GoldenVillage
Vodka with a teaspoon of Coca-Cola to have the balance in life to keep my day going. Ofcoz while watching my favourite show, Deadpool at GV #CocaColaFreestyleSG #GoldenVillage #doublegreatness

Coca-cola zero is the most perfect movie drink bcos the sweet bubbling cool beverage makes me happy and therefore allows me to enjoy the movie more.....especially when it is a comedy film. Action movie also becomes a more thrilling experience when sucking coca cola zero and most importantly,  zero calories haha 😂

coca cola orange  - just want to try what it tastes like! It is the perfect movie drink because coca cola fits for any movie while orange is good for chinese movies especially during Chinese New year!
Pepsi is no longer in my perfect movie dink , from that day when I taste Coca-Cola because it Simply delight my movie time.
Even if I am late for show, I could not watch a movie without a cup of Coca Cola because it's simply important!!

Original Coca-cola with Lime! Just like my movie date it gives me happy giggles with every sip. Refreshing! #CocaColaFreestyleSG
#GoldenVillage

Coca-cola light and raspberry! I mean come on! You put 2 of the greatest soda flavours together... BOOM! magic. I love this whole creative spin from Coca-cola. Truly outdoing yourselves this time. Brilliant beyond brilliant!

Nothing still can beat the original. I always love the original coca cola drinking always a very good companion for popcorn or what ever snacks. But the with new flavour i prefer the coca cola vanilla i already try it once when we are in other country me and hubby love the taste. Have a nice sweet vanilla taste it is a good drink while watching movies.

#CocaColaFreestyleSG #GoldenVillage

0.post_text:
Planning a movie night? Explore countless new beverage options the next time you catch a movie! With Coca-Cola Freestyle now at GV Plaza (Golden Village, Plaza Singapura), we’re offering a pair of GV movie tickets, along with 2 Coca-Cola Freestyle beverages if you share with us your answer to the following question:

“Which Coca-Cola Freestyle beverage is the perfect movie drink and why?”

The top 5 most creative answers wins!

#CocaColaFreestyleSG #GoldenVillage

For more information visit: www.coca-cola.com.sg/freestyle

Terms and conditions apply:  http://CokeURL.com/CokeFreestyleGV

Contest ends 15 March 2016.

comments.message:
The #BuffetTown #CocaColaFreestyleSG Contest has come to an end! Thank you everyone for all the creative answers! Congratulations to:

•	Aimee Venice Chua
•	Celeste Chong
•	Ester Em
•	Ng Chow Yong
•	Candice Teo

You’ve each won for yourselves a pair of #BuffetTown lunch vouchers worth $49.60++ with free flow of Coca-Cola Freestyle! Please directly message us with your full name, NRIC, email address and contact number and we’ll get in touch with prize collection details!

Keep a lookout for our next #CocaColaFreesyleSG contest!

Most of the Freestyle drinks look amazing, and I can't wait to try them all! But if there is one that I'd love to try, I'd say it's the Coca Cola Orange. Partly because I'm an orange fan and my house just ran out of mandarin oranges from CNY so the only way for me to sustain this craving is to have the Coca Cola Orange. As to why not other flavours with orange, I'd say I would! But I just prefer the original Coke the most! #anythingX🍊

Ooo... I'd love to try caffeine-free raspberry-flavored Coke zero! If this drink were a person, I imagine it as a sassy, trendy, capable woman in stilettos and a power suit. I want to explore these facets of possibilities with Coca-Cola Freestyle!

I am a big fan of coke! whenever there's opportunity for myself to take my own drinks, say for example, for big glup at 7 eleven, I would always mix and match coke with sprite, and at times coke with a little of fanta grape, fanta orange and sprite; I always like to mix my drinks of coke with something else :) I just think that coke goes well with any carbonated drinks! :) I would like to try coca cola zero caffein free with raspberry :) or sprite with strawberry, reason being it's just not something you can really get that easily, or something you will drink every day or very often! :) #BuffetTown #CocaColaFreestyleSG
Coca Cola Light Cherry Vanilla! Everything i like all in one beverage.... Awesome-licious combination to pair with a nice buffet spread! <3
My favourite Coca Cola freestyle drinks is Coca Cola lime. I love to add lemon/lime slice to coca cola drinks. This drinks is the best taste combination because it is fizzy sour and zesty sweet.

My favorite is always original coca cola. It's my first soft drink I ever tried since I was a kid bought by my grandma and the taste still remain till now. It does bring back all the memories together with you, grandma. I miss you and may we can meet up someday again in heaven. :)
Liked and shared.

My favourite Coca Cola freestyle drinks is 
Sprite with grape.
I like sprite and grape a lot.
So I am grateful that coca cola freestyle has this!

I would love to try coca cola vanilla! Taste like ice cream! My hubby loves coke and he will be on clouds 9 if free flow of coke is given to him! Hope to win Buffet Town International Buffet restaurant vouchers so we could bring our daughter for good meal during the march holidays!!! Thank you!! #BuffetTown

I would love to try all!! But if I really had to choose 1, it would be Coca-Cola Orange that I'd LOVE most to try because orange in Chinese means prosperity and lucky especially during Chinese New year, thus, I would want to be prosperous and lucky by drinking Coca-Cola Orange! Also, I think Coca-Cola and orange will go really well together! I can't stand it anymore! I just want to try all flavours now!! 😍 Pleaseeeeeeee 🤗 Dominique Choo

I would definitely love to try Coke Zero Cherry Vanilla as it reminds me of Strawberries and Cream! Being a lover of the tangy taste of berries, softened by the milky, creamy taste of vanilla and cream, and of course refreshing coke, I would definitely be an ardent fan of this trio combination! This drink would probably give me a Cleopatra experience in a can! #CocaColaFreestyleSG #BuffetTown
I would love to try Coca-Cola Freestyle drink with lemon and use it as common remedy for cold. Adding coke is just to make it tastes better and balances the tartness and acidity of lemon.
I love to drink ice cold Coca-Cola for breakfast, lunch & dinner.  It's the best beverage to satisfy my sweet cravings & cools me down in the hot weather :)

I think i would go for Fanta Zero Fruit Punch! It's like having it all fruity in a soda with zero calories! I can compare this drink with everyone's life: we will all have a taste of different emotions like fear, sadness, happiness, excitement and others, but at the end of the day, we will go to bed and sleep worry-free. ;)

I liked my original coca-cola. This time I would like to try original coca-cola with orange or lime. Original with a twist! Just like in life/relationship when it gets boring you twist and tweak a bit here and there to make it fun and exciting, but sometimes you just want your laid back life seat at the balcony with a glass of ice cold Coca-cola. Ooooh! 😮😋
If only I could have them all at once! I love Fanta Lime the best! It has the most refreshing taste to pair with my Mee Goreng and Laksa!

Whoever said that less is more probably have no idea that #CocaColaFreestyleSG exists. Imagine your favourite soda with your favourite fruit flavours, oh my, im already salivating, but yeah, this really is exciting. Just thinking about how many possible combinations one can make, makes me really really really excited. You dont need to wait for any holiday or special occasions, try one flavour a day will definitely make your day!

I love Cherry Coke but then I thought, I wish they have Cherry Sprite coz I bet it will really taste nice. Lo and behold, i didn't use any genie but my wish was granted. I really really really would like to try Cherry Sprite! Please let me! Hahahah I want to know how this concoction taste like! 

#BuffetTown #CocaColaFreestyleSG

I would love to try the Coca-Cola Zero in raspberry flavour,
Zero in calories yet with a tinge of berry-sweetness,
It will make me feel less guilty to go for an extra serving of my favourite dish,
And still have space for a free flow of refreshing and fruity sweet-ending to my buffet binge...Burp! ❤️

I am but a simple man and being a simple man I love my Coca-Cola Zero. Coca-Cola Zero fits into my life as it is sweet enough but calorie free. Besides it tastes as much as the regular Coca-Cola. But having seen the vast selection I will definitely try it all and mix and match. I simply love the Coca-Cola Brand. #Ilovecocacola

My favourite Coca Cola freestyle drinks is Coca Cola Vanilla as I used to add vanilla ice cream to my Coca Cola drinks.  I love the creamy vanilla taste that bends well with the zesty Coca cola. It's so smooth and refreshing especially when you are enjoying a spread of buffet. Perfect combination!

I apologize, but my favourite Coca Cola product is the Heaven and Earth teas :q

Especially Passion Fruit and Jasmine Green tea. Every single day, I will go down to the SPC outlet at the petrol station near my house and buy those 2 flavours. They are always on offer @$2.20 for 2. Both are the best drinks to have after a hard day of work.
Also at subway and burger king, the drink that I would always get would be Passion Fruit tea.

Tho its sad and disappointing not to see Heaven and Earth products here in the picture, I would just like to give a shout out to the probably underrated beverages by the Coca Cola company. 
Thumbs up for Heaven and Earth!

My favourite drink will be  the classic Coke Zero! It is a product so well balanced between taste and health. Fizzyness, unique taste , along with the aesthetic colour of the drink enthused me to gulp down the entire drink! Drinking Coke Zero not only makes me feel young, but stay young as well! Definitely recommended 👍

Experience the joy of drinking Coke today!
#CocaColaFreestyleSG

Omg!! I love this new coca-cola Freestyle drink machine!! I use to store up all coca-cola brand cans drink in my fridge and now came in mix flavor is really so excited! I love Coca-Cola Light cherry vanilla! Because I simply love the taste when it mix. It is so special and great taste! Hope to win :)

Most favourite coca cola freestyle drink is of course still the original,coca cola. Of coz im not trying to say other flavor is bad but i always order coca cola no matter where i go i dont know why but i always tend to order coca cola despite it being a very sugary and sweet drink with lots of sugar cubes added inside. But who cares right? Life is short so why not do more and have no regrets at all? I like coca cola for the taste,fizzyness,and the aesthetics look of the bottle and love to gulp all at once so i can do a loud burp to my friends haha

Coca cola light with lime/lemon flavour because first i love sour taste and i have been having coca cola light since it doesnt taste as sweet and sugarish compared to coca cola. And why like Coca-Cola you say, it's a coca cola freestyle drink which simply definitely it's for me because I love dancing freestyle and can you see the compatibility between the drink and me XD

For more information about where else you can explore countless new possibilities visit http://www.coca-cola.com.sg/freestyle/

#BuffetTown #CocaColaFreestyleSG

Terms & Conditions apply: http://CokeURL.com/FreestyleSG Contest ends on 2 March 2016.

16.post_text:
Diana: I’m 28 this year and my dad’s celebrating his “12th anniversary of his 50th birthday”. I chose to get this photo with my dad because he keeps our fridge stocked with my favourite #Coke light. This Chinese New Year, I’d like to wish my dad his first hole-in-one. He’s been a golfer for a long time now and has seen his brother and golf kakis all get theirs, and I know it would mean the world to him when he finally achieves this.

My best memory of CNY happened last year when the family went to Bangkok together. Time with my parents is hard to come by because of our busy work schedules, so the few days spent in Bangkok (where my dad was born) were especially precious. 

Patrick: I wish for Diana to find her Mr. Right this year (laughs).

#CocaCola #2016 #CokeCNYsg

19.post_text:
Shiyun: My best friend Jolene and I have been friends since we were nine, and will be celebrating our 20th year of friendship this year. Apart from my family, she’s the one constant figure in my life, and I cannot recall a time in my life when she’s not been there. My dad calls her his third daughter, because Jolene’s practically family.

My birthday falls on Chinese New Year once every 12 years, and my favourite memory of CNY is of her trying to help celebrate my birthday despite her many family gatherings. She really made sure that my birthday wasn’t spent just being at long-drawn family lunches and dinners. 

This Chinese New Year, I wish for her to always find happiness, in spite of any circumstances.

Jolene: And I wish for Shiyun to stay happy, healthy and blessed.

#CocaCola #2016 #CokeCNYsg
